alert.note: Alert for South Central Elko County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 7:27AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Snow through the morning hours across northeast Nevada... Snow continues to fall across portions of northeast Nevada. The primary impact will be slick roads through the mid-morning hours. This includes Elko, Spring Creek and Ruby Valley along with US-93 south of I-80 in Elko county. Motorists should remain alert to changing weather and road conditions, and reduce speeds over snow covered roadways. Road conditions in particular should improve late this morning as snow levels and temperatures rise. Snow is expected to changeover to primarily rain around 10 am with some locations around noon. Considerable mountain snow is still expected through tonight across the area. Snow levels will rise to to around 7000 feet this afternoon before falling tonight to as low as 5000 feet. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.

area.areaDesc: South Central Elko County; Southwest Elko County
